thread.title: Jets place Patrik Laine on IR, call up Julian Melchiori
thread.title_full: Jets place Patrik Laine on IR, call up Julian Melchiori

author: Andrew Bottomley
title: Jets place Patrik Laine on IR, call up Julian Melchiori
text:
Presented by: Jets place Patrik Laine on IR, call up Julian Melchiori 
Winnipeg Jets coach Paul Maurice told media that Patrik Laine has been diagnosed with a concussion after taking a big hit from Jake McCabe. January 13, 2017, 5:37 PM Andrew Bottomley January 13, 2017, 5:37 PM 
The Winnipeg Jets placed rookie forward Patrik Laine on injured reserve on Friday, retro-active to Jan.7. 
In a corresponding move they called up defenceman Julian Melchiori from their AHL affiliate, the Manitoba Moose. #NHLJets recall Melchiori from @ManitobaMoose , and place Laine on IR retro-active to Jan. 7. 
— Winnipeg Jets (@NHLJets) January 13, 2017 
Laine suffered a concussion after a massive hit from Buffalo Sabres defenceman Jake McCabe during the third period of their game on Saturday. 
This puts Laine's stellar season on hold for the foreseeable future. In 42 games this year he has recorded 21 goals and 16 assists, putting him at the top of the rookie scoring race. 
His move to the injured reserve puts his participation in the NHL All-Star Game in jeopardy after he was named to the team earlier this week. 
Melchiori has played in four games with the Jets this season and has been held without a point, posting a minus-three rating. %2Fhockey%2Fnhl%2Fjets-place-patrik-laine-ir-call-julian-melchiori%2F
